text: It was a special night for Britney Spears at the 2017 Radio Disney Music Awards, as she was honored with the inaugural Icon Award. Not only that, but sister Jamie Lynn Spears made a surprise appearance, taking part in a performance medley of her older sibling's hits. Jamie Lynn presented Britney with the first - ever Icon Award and joined Kelsea Ballerini, Sofia Carson and Hailee Steinfeld for a medley of ` `... Baby One More Time,'' ` ` Circus'' and ` ` Till the World Ends.'' ` ` What a pleasant surprise, my goodness!'' the older Spears said upon receiving the Icon Award. ` ` This is such an honor. I want to thank Radio Disney so much for giving me their first - ever Icon Award
